Description.Title: Soil Temperature
Description.ExtendedDescription: A one-dimensional soil temperature component that computes diurnal soil temperature dynamics across soil nodes using heat diffusion solved by a tridiagonal (Thomas) method. The vertical grid includes an air node, a surface node, soil nodes per layer, and phantom nodes to represent deep boundary conditions. Initialization can use provided layer temperatures or an annual sinusoidal profile based on mean annual temperature (Tav), amplitude (Amp), day of year, latitude, and layer thickness. The model optionally computes net radiation from meteorological inputs (shortwave radiation, cloudiness proxy) or derives it from potential/actual soil evaporation. Boundary layer conductance above the surface can be set constant or iteratively calculated from wind speed, air pressure, instrument height, canopy height, and Moninâ€“Obukhov stability corrections with a radiative conductance term. Soil volumetric specific heat and effective thermal conductivity are computed by mixing rules over constituents (rocks, organic matter, sand, silt, clay, water, ice, air) using constituent volumetric fractions (from texture, bulk density, organic carbon, rock fraction, soil water) and shape factors. Outputs include updated soil temperatures at nodes, daily min/max/average soil temperatures per layer, heat storage, thermal conductivity/conductance, boundary layer conductance, and diagnostic variables.
Description.ShortDescription: 1D soil heat diffusion model with mixed-constituent thermal properties and optional iterative boundary layer conductance, initialized from annual sinusoid or provided temperatures.

Input.name: waterBalance_SW
Input.description: Water balance soil water by layer

Input.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
Input.description: Depth to constant temperature bottom boundary

Input.name: airNode
Input.description: Index of air node in vertical grid

Input.name: surfaceNode
Input.description: Index of soil surface node in grid

Input.name: topsoilNode
Input.description: Index of topsoil node for initial profile mapping

Input.name: numPhantomNodes
Input.description: Number of phantom nodes below profile

Input.name: constantBoundaryLayerConductance
Input.description: Fixed boundary layer conductance when using constant source

Input.name: numIterationsForBoundaryLayerConductance
Input.description: Iterations to converge stability corrections for boundary layer conductance

Input.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
Input.description: Hour of day for maximum air temperature

Input.name: bareSoilRoughness
Input.description: Bare soil roughness height used at initialization

Input.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
Input.description: Boundary layer conductance source (constant or calc)

Input.name: MissingValue
Input.description: Sentinel missing value used in arrays

Input.name: soilConstituentNames
Input.description: List of soil constituents to include (e.g., Rocks, OrganicMatter, Sand, Silt, Clay, Water, Ice, Air, Minerals)

Input.name: InitialValues
Input.description: Initial soil temperature values provided or derived

Input.name: internalTimeStep
Input.description: Internal sub-daily step length used for diurnal loop

Input.name: timeOfDaySecs
Input.description: Seconds from midnight within current day loop

Input.name: numNodes
Input.description: Number of nodes in vertical grid (including phantom nodes)

Input.name: numLayers
Input.description: Number of soil layers (excluding phantom nodes)

Input.name: volSpecHeatSoil
Input.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil per node

Input.name: morningSoilTemp
Input.description: Soil temperature snapshot near 5:00 AM by node

Input.name: heatStorage
Input.description: Heat storage capacity term per node over internal step

Input.name: thermalConductivity
Input.description: Thermal conductivity per node (used internally; recalculated each step)

Input.name: boundaryLayerConductance
Input.description: Boundary layer conductance at surface-air interface

Input.name: newTemperature
Input.description: Working temperature vector used by solver (includes air node)

Input.name: maxTempYesterday
Input.description: Yesterday maximum temperature for diurnal interpolation

Input.name: minTempYesterday
Input.description: Yesterday minimum temperature for diurnal interpolation

Input.name: soilWater
Input.description: Soil water content per layer/node (volumetric or mapped)

Input.name: minSoilTemp
Input.description: Minimum soil temperature encountered during the day per node

Input.name: maxSoilTemp
Input.description: Maximum soil temperature encountered during the day per node

Input.name: aveSoilTemp
Input.description: Average soil temperature over the day per node

Input.name: aveSoilWater
Input.description: Average soil water over the day per node (not used)

Input.name: thickness
Input.description: Model thickness array including phantom nodes (1-based indexing logic)

Input.name: bulkDensity
Input.description: Bulk density per layer/node (propagated to phantom nodes)

Input.name: instrumentHeight
Input.description: Instrument (wind) height used for BL conductance calc

Input.name: netRadiation
Input.description: Net radiation at soil surface per internal step

Input.name: canopyHeight
Input.description: Effective canopy height used in roughness and BL conductance

Input.name: instrumHeight
Input.description: Instrument height input (unused downstream, kept for interface)

Input.name: nodeDepth
Input.description: Grid node depths (passed to process for solver geometry)

Output.name: InitialValues
Output.description: Updated/derived initial soil temperature profile values

Output.name: doInitialisationStuff
Output.description: Flag indicating whether initialization is pending (0/1)

Output.name: internalTimeStep
Output.description: Internal sub-daily step length used for diurnal loop

Output.name: timeOfDaySecs
Output.description: Seconds from midnight within current day loop

Output.name: volSpecHeatSoil
Output.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil per node

Output.name: soilTemp
Output.description: Updated soil temperature profile by node

Output.name: morningSoilTemp
Output.description: Soil temperatures around early morning (5:00) by node

Output.name: heatStorage
Output.description: Heat storage coefficient per node over internal step

Output.name: thermalConductance
Output.description: Thermal conductance between nodes after solve

Output.name: boundaryLayerConductance
Output.description: Mean boundary layer conductance for the day

Output.name: newTemperature
Output.description: Updated working temperature vector by node (includes air node)

Output.name: airTemperature
Output.description: Updated air node temperature

Output.name: maxTempYesterday
Output.description: Stored yesterday maximum temperature

Output.name: minTempYesterday
Output.description: Stored yesterday minimum temperature

Output.name: soilWater
Output.description: Updated soil water per layer/node

Output.name: minSoilTemp
Output.description: Daily minimum soil temperature per node

Output.name: maxSoilTemp
Output.description: Daily maximum soil temperature per node

Output.name: aveSoilTemp
Output.description: Daily average soil temperature per node

Output.name: instrumentHeight
Output.description: Updated instrument (wind) height after constraints

Output.name: netRadiation
Output.description: Net radiation at soil surface for the time step

Output.name: canopyHeight
Output.description: Updated effective canopy height

Function.name: getIniVariables
Function.description: Initializes instrumentHeight from provided instrument or default.

Function.name: Sum
Function.description: Sums list values over index range skipping MissingValue.

Function.name: Divide
Function.description: Safe division returning errVal if denominator is zero.

Function.name: ToCumThickness
Function.description: Converts layer thicknesses to cumulative depths.

Function.name: kelvinT
Function.description: Converts Celsius to Kelvin.

Function.name: airDensity
Function.description: Computes air density from temperature and pressure.

Function.name: longWaveRadn
Function.description: Computes longwave radiation using emissivity and temperature.

Function.name: volumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Returns volumetric specific heat for named soil constituent.

Function.name: volumetricFractionRocks
Function.description: Rock volumetric fraction for a layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionOrganicMatter
Function.description: Organic matter volumetric fraction for a layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionIce
Function.description: Ice volumetric fraction for a layer (returns 0).

Function.name: volumetricFractionWater
Function.description: Water volumetric fraction for a layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionClay
Function.description: Clay volumetric fraction for a layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionSilt
Function.description: Silt volumetric fraction for a layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionSand
Function.description: Sand volumetric fraction for a layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionAir
Function.description: Air volumetric fraction for a layer.

Function.name: mapLayer2Node
Function.description: Maps per-layer values to nodes using linear weighting by distances.

Function.name: ThermalConductance
Function.description: Returns (overwritten) conductance per constituent; preserves original bug using volumetricSpecificHeat.

Function.name: shapeFactor
Function.description: Returns (overwritten) shape factor; preserves original bug using volumetricSpecificHeat.

Function.name: Zero
Function.description: Zeroes a list in place if not None.

Function.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Computes volumetric specific heat per node and maps to nodes.

Function.name: doThermalConductivity
Function.description: Computes effective thermal conductivity per node.

Function.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
Function.description: Iteratively computes boundary layer conductance with stability corrections.

Function.name: interpolateNetRadiation
Function.description: Computes net shortwave and longwave radiation reaching soil per internal step.

Function.name: interpolateTemperature
Function.description: Diurnal air temperature interpolation using sine curves.

Function.name: doThomas
Function.description: Thomas algorithm for tridiagonal heat conduction solve.

Function.name: doUpdate
Function.description: Updates soil temperatures, min/max/avg, and accumulates BL conductance.

Function.name: doNetRadiation
Function.description: Distributes daily solar radiation and computes cloud fraction and cva.

Function.name: doProcess
Function.description: Performs one dayâ€™s internal loop: radiation, BL conductance, solve, and daily aggregations.

Function.name: doThermalConductivityCoeffs
Function.description: Computes thermal conductivity parameter arrays per node.

Function.name: calcSoilTemperature
Function.description: Initial seasonal soil temperature profile by depth.

Function.name: calcSurfaceTemperature
Function.description: Computes surface temperature from radiation and albedo.

Function.name: readParam
Function.description: Initializes conductivity parameters, soil temps, and roughness height.

Function.name: getOtherVariables
Function.description: Refreshes soil water, instrument height, canopy height from inputs.

Function.name: getProfileVariables
Function.description: Builds model profile arrays (thickness, nodeDepth, properties, phantom nodes).

Function.name: ValuesInArray
Function.description: Checks if array has any non-missing values.

Function.name: math_pi
Function.description: Returns PI constant.

Function.name: math_sin
Function.description: Wrapper for math.sin.

Function.name: math_cos
Function.description: Wrapper for math.cos.

Function.name: math_log
Function.description: Safe natural log with guard for non-positive inputs.

Function.name: math_exp
Function.description: Wrapper for math.exp.
